contentfulSermon.title: Ephesians: Week 4 - Outsider to Family Member

fields.notesFormatted:
Outsider

Ephesians 2:11-13

  • Without Christ.
  • Without family.
  • Without citizenship.
  • Without promises.
  • Without hope.

Family Member

Ephesians 2:14-22

Galatians 3:28

2 Corinthians 5:17

John 17:20-23

1 Corinthians 6:9-11

  • We are united by our sin and our Savior.
  • We are children with complete access to God.
  • We receive citizenship to live like a citizen.
